channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI

item.title: Report E-2024060061
item.description:
Report E-2024060061

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-17T18:16:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: WATERFORD TOWNSHIP
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material released from one (1) 5-gallon metal pial. The released material impacted the concrete terminal floor due to a forklift puncture. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the cleanup debris and damaged pail into one (1) 15-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight's contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024060605
item.description:
Report X-2024060605

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-14T15:12:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-04
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING PACKAGE. CONTENTS WAS 2-1 GALLON MOHAWK BLACK STAIN DYE. LOOSE CAPS ON BOTH CONTAINERS. PACKAGE WAS MARKED PROPERLY. DIAMOND LABEL FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3. UN1263 PAINT.. SHIPPING PAPERS.. UN1263, PAINT, 3, II FIBERBOARD BOX 2 GALLONS. BOTH GALLONS WERE ABSORBED WITH ZEP ZORBENT. CONTAMINATED CARDBOARD WAS CUT UP AND PLACED IN GREEN DMP BAG. AWAITING FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS FOR DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024051674
item.description:
Report X-2024051674

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-14T15:12:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-28
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: No release. The box tore open due to insufficient inner packaging. There are no external markings on the package and no Hazmat barcode. The inner container has a corrosive diamond label and the SDS was acquired from the manufacturer. Item is classified as 8(6.1).
